column4: hi, guys. I want to try out this distribution, but I am unable to burn an ISO or use a pendrive. I have seen the wubi installer (I currently run Windows) - The only problem is that I don't want to install -inside- windows. I would also like to be able to specify partitions to use. In short, is this possible?
Why can't you use a CD or flash drive? There are other methods of booting, too, such as over the network.
basically, my hardware sucks. I can't burn and I don't own a flash drive.
If there is a way to do it, it will be ratehr difficult.
